alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Northern Wayne; Susquehanna (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Frost Advisory issued October 02 at 3:26PM EDT until October 03 at 9:00AM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 9 AM EDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures of 32 to 35 will result in frost formation. * WHERE...In New York, Northern Oneida, Yates, Seneca, Southern Cayuga, Onondaga, Steuben, Schuyler, Chemung, Tompkins, Madison, Southern Oneida, Cortland, Chenango, Otsego, Tioga, Broome and Delaware counties. In Pennsylvania, Bradford, Susquehanna and Northern Wayne counties. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 9 AM EDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Scattered high clouds may prevent frost formation in some areas within the advisory area.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.
